original_text: But some men spoke against Stephen. They did not agree with what he taught people. These men were from one of the Jewish meeting places in Jerusalem. People called them, ‘The Group of Free Men’. These men were Jews from the cities called Cyrene and Alexandria. Some of them were from towns in Cilicia and Asia. They began to argue with Stephen.
korean_text: 이른 바 자유민들 즉 구레네인, 알렉산드리아인, 길리기아와 아시아에서 온 사람들의 회당에서 어떤 자들이 일어나 스데반과 더불어 논쟁할새

sentences.original_text: But some men spoke against Stephen.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 사람들이 스데반을 반대하여 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They did not agree with what he taught people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 사람들을 가르친 것에 동의하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: These men were from one of the Jewish meeting places in Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 예루살렘의 유대 회당 중 하나에서 온 사람들이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: People called them, 'The Group of Free Men'.
These men were Jews from the cities called Cyrene and Alexandria.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 키레네와 알렉산드리아라는 도시에서 온 유대인들이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Some of them were from towns in Cilicia and Asia.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 일부는 길리기아와 아시아의 도시에서 온 사람들이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They began to argue with Stephen.
